sentences.en: "Kathleen" was, as its 1892 subtitle asserted, "An Irish Drama".
sentences.cn: 正如1892年剧本的副标题所强调的，《凯瑟琳》是一部“爱尔兰戏剧”。

sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: As a parent, I feel that more should be done to protect our children.
sentences.cn: 身为家长，我觉得应采取更多措施来保护我们的孩子。

sentences.en: As for you, you'd better be quick.
sentences.cn: 至于你，你最好快点。

sentences.en: As from 1 January, a free market will be created.
sentences.cn: 从1月1号开始，一个自由市场将建成。

sentences.en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
sentences.cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

sentences.en: As long as my heart still beats, I will go on working for the people.
sentences.cn: 只要我的心脏还在跳动，我就要为人民工作。

sentences.en: As of this writing, no reply has been received.
sentences.cn: 到写这封信时为止，尚未得到答复。

sentences.en: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.cn: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.en: Do as I say!
sentences.cn: 按我说的去做！

sentences.en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
sentences.cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: He lived on an invalidity pension which came as a weekly giro.
sentences.cn: 他靠每周领取的作为病残养老金的直接转账救济支票过日子。

sentences.en: He should pay and maintain you as well.
sentences.cn: 他得给你钱，还得供养你。

sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentences.cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentences.en: He was jailed for five years as an alleged British spy.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为英国间谍，入狱关押了5年。

sentences.en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentences.cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentences.en: His last album sold half a million copies and we hope this one will be just as (=  equally  ) popular.
sentences.cn: 他上一张专辑售出50万张，我们希望这张同样畅销。

sentences.en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

sentences.en: How can there be things as such?
sentences.cn: 哪会有这种事？

sentences.en: I approached an Intourist official, as per instructions.
sentences.cn: 我按照指示接洽了一位苏联国际旅行社官员。

sentences.en: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.cn: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.en: I thought it looked as though the battery was going.
sentences.cn: 我看电池好像该换了。

sentences.en: I'm as much in the dark as you.
sentences.cn: 我和你一样毫不知情。

sentences.en: I'm on the dole as from now.
sentences.cn: 从现在开始我就要吃救济了。

sentences.en: I've got enough on my plate as it is.
sentences.cn: 眼下我要做的事情已够多的了。

sentences.en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentences.cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentences.en: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.cn: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

sentences.en: Please let me know your decision as soon as possible (=  as soon as you can  ) .
sentences.cn: 请尽快告诉我你的决定。

sentences.en: She behaved as if he wasn't there.
sentences.cn: 她的所作所为好像他根本不在场似的。

sentences.en: She knows me as well as him.
sentences.cn: 她像了解他一样了解我。

sentences.en: The house seemed muted, hushed as if it had been deserted.
sentences.cn: 房子里似乎悄然无声，安静得好像已经没人在住一样。

sentences.en: The Koran recommends fasting as a penance before pilgrimages.
sentences.cn: 《古兰经》劝告人们在朝圣前斋戒，以作为一种补赎。

sentences.en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
sentences.cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

sentences.en: They deal with an issue as and when it rears its head.
sentences.cn: 事到临头他们才会开始处理。

sentences.en: This gave me a clue as to the source of the problem.
sentences.cn: 这件事给我提供了找出问题根源的线索。

sentences.en: You know how pools winners always say it won't change their lives? Yeah, as if.
sentences.cn: 你知道那些足球赛赌博的赢家们总是说赢了钱还是改变不了他们的生活吗？当然知道，可我才不信呢。

words.tran_cn: 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时

phrases.tran_cn: 在目前情况下，按现在情况来看
[用于指不确定的未来之事]当
adv. 至于，直到，远到；就…而言
(主 英)[用于指某事开始之时或开始的日期] 从
和…几乎一样，实际上等于…

trans.tran_en: used when you are comparing two people, things, situations etc
